textBox.richText: The Swiss Center for Biometrics Research and Testing is a center for biometric excellence established to advance biometric security technologies, mainly by facilitating collaboration between industry and academia. Its core missions are: • to carry out high quality research • to train talented engineers and researchers • to foster technology transfer from academia to industry • to propose evaluation and testing services in the domain of biometric security. http://www.biometrics-center.ch
The Swiss Center for Biometrics Research and Testing
